title: Window Shoppin
description: A collaborative project using several technologies, third-party API's, and web scraping, this application allows users to keep track of items they have seen online they may not want to buy right away, but watch for a better price.

title: Eat-Da-Burger
description: Featuring Handlebars, this allows users to keep track of burgers they have seen and want to try, and take note of when they have tried them.

title: Password Generator
description: An application that enables users to generate highly secure passwords based on personal specifications of length and included characters.

title: Employee Directory
description: Using React.js and a random user API to provide sampling, this application allows users to instantly search through and sort a list of people, their images, contact information, and date of birth.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Using React.js and a random user API to provide sampling, this application allows users to instantly search through and sort a list of people, their images, contact information, and date of birth.
